archimate:BusinessFunction.name: Project Planning
archimate:BusinessFunction.documentation:
As stated in ISO/IEC/IEEE 15288, [6.3.1.1] The purpose of the Project Planning process is to produce and coordinate effective and workable plans.
See detailed description in the INCOSE Handbook v.4, page 104

properties.value: Gemäß ISO/IEC/IEEE 15288 (laut INCOSE Handbuch 4.0 - übersetzt von GfSE): "[6.3.1.1] Der Zweck des Prozesses "Projektplanung" ist das Erzeugen und Koordinieren wirkungsvoller und ausführbarer Projektpläne".
As stated in ISO/IEC/IEEE 15288, [6.3.1.1] The purpose of the Project Planning process is to produce and coordinate effective and workable plans.
